Post-Match Reflections: India coach Manolo Marquez said that he was happy with his side's performance, especially in the second half despite losing to Syria on Monday, September 9.
Others: Marquez felt the scoreline was a fair reflection of the game
Marquez said his side was 1000 times better in the second half

After a rather lacklustre 1st half, India had a host of chances as they were able to test the Syrian goalkeeper. Liston Colaco would unleash a fiery shot that would rattle the crossbar and almost went in.
